Clara Rigo
Research Activities Projects

Screenshot_003

Screenshot_003 is the third and last edition of the Screenshot project made in 2019, which featured the work of the following artists: Florentin Jeanneau, Blobs & Fluff, Djé, Fazepeel, Pskl, Dephone, Holographic_thought_process, Igor Goryunov, Ivan Murit, Solaris, Thomas Collet, ≈sheglitchr, Simon Lazarus, Vector & Golf.

For this last cover, I experimented with the combination of raster, shadow/light, and 3D glitch.

We organised two release parties in Paris (International) and in Bordeaux (Novo Local).

More pictures to come…
